name: Peter Jackson
summary: Peter Jackson. Producer: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring. Sir Peter Jackson made history with The Lord of the Rings trilogy, becoming the first person to direct three major feature films simultaneously. The Fellowship of the Ring, The Two Towers and The Return of the King were nominated for and collected a slew of awards from around the globe, with The Return of the King receiving...
